item.title: MonkeySee: Space-time-resolved reconstructions of natural images from macaque multi-unit activity
item.description: MonkeySee reconstructs natural images from macaque brain signals with high accuracy using a novel CNN decoder, advancing neural decoding and offering insights into visual perception.
